project.name: Teamo
project.description: SkillSwipe is a Tinder-inspired platform for professionals and creatives to showcase their skills, connect with collaborators, and bring projects to life. Users create a portfolio-style profile with snippets of their best work, tag their expertise, and scroll through other portfolios in a short-form, swipeable feed. Whether youâ€™re a game designer seeking a developer, a writer looking for an illustrator, or a musician needing a producer, SkillSwipe makes it easy to discover talent, match with collaborators, and start working together. Search by skills, industries, or project type, then swipe through potential matches and connect instantly.
